data.name: Capt Quinn re Prov
data.desc: Capt Quinn, Eng pirate or buccaneer, seeks to start settlement in Prov Isl
data.note:
1616-1620 Prov. Capt Quinn plants platains, pineapples, yucca, corn, cattle, pigs, hens at Prov / also assaults Sp shipping between Cuba and Yuc /v Genkins 52 /INDIFERENTE,1528 /
 15 May 1620 Zacharias, Mercado to Sp Crown. Report that an inhabitant of Cuba called 'Ridert' disclosed Prov to the Eng after having his property in Cuba seized without cause /v Genkins 52 /INDIFERENTE,1528
